titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation concerning the making of starch, and auoiding the annoyances thereby.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Bonham Norton, and lohn [sic] Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: ... Greenwich, the thirtieth day of Iune, in the fift yeere of our reigne ..
Arms 23; Steele notation: vpon be 2) to Priuie.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
